meanings.definition: A drug used in chemotherapy to treat various types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doxorubicin helped fight the cancer cells in her body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed doxorubicin to treat his leukemia.
meanings.sent3: The doxorubicin and cancer cells had a serious showdown in her body.
meanings.sent4: Her body was a battlefield where doxorubicin warriors fought against cancer invaders.
meanings.sent5: The doxorubicin was like a brave soldier attacking the enemy cancer cells.
